name: Take Something Literally (Flash Game Desktop Version)
name_original: Take Something Literally (Flash Game Desktop Version)
description:
Take something literally is a compilation of 20 puzzles.

Released in 2009 (40M plays)
NOTE : Download and play without the Flash plugin

This game is abstract, conceptual, non-conform and uses new interactivities.

The rules are quite simple. Take the hints literally and just think outside the box. Be aware of your environment. Everybody can play and enjoy this game. You don’t have to be an hardcore gamer to play you just have to be logical.
